description: This seminar explores the history of work in the 20th-Century U.S. by focusing on: changes in the workplace; transformations in the culture of work; work in a global context; and the history of organized labor. Each student will write a substantial research project.
name: Sem:Work in US since 1920
notes: Especially for rising junior and senior history and American studies majors.
title: American History Seminar: Work in the U.S. since 1920
